openAiApi.name: Metanow open api - Lead Generation API

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
    "primary_category": "category_name",
    "tags": ["max_5_evidence_based_tags"],
    "confidence": 0.85,
    "rationale": "WordPress data and content evidence explanation",
    "description_en": "English description (max 100 chars)",
    "description_de": "German description (max 100 chars)"
}

akismet.name: Akismet Anti-spam: Spam Protection
akismet.description: Used by millions, Akismet is quite possibly the best way in the world to protect your blog from spam. Akismet Anti-spam keeps your site protected even while you sleep. To get started: activate the Akismet plugin and then go to your Akismet Settings page to set up your API key.
akismet.author: Automattic - Anti-spam Team

all-in-one-wp-migration.name: All-in-One WP Migration and Backup
all-in-one-wp-migration.description: All-in-One WP Migration makes moving your entire WordPress site simple. Export or import your database, media, plugins, and themes with just a few clicks.
all-in-one-wp-migration.author: ServMask

all-in-one-wp-migration-unlimited-extens.name: All-in-One WP Migration Unlimited Extension
all-in-one-wp-migration-unlimited-extens.description: Extension for All-in-One WP Migration that enables unlimited size exports and imports
all-in-one-wp-migration-unlimited-extens.author: ServMask

dynamicconditions.name: DynamicConditions
dynamicconditions.description: Activates conditions for dynamic tags to show/hides a widget.
dynamicconditions.author: RTO GmbH

elementor.name: Elementor
elementor.description: The Elementor Website Builder has it all: drag and drop page builder, pixel perfect design, mobile responsive editing, and more. Get started now!
elementor.author: Elementor.com

elementor-pro.name: Elementor Pro
elementor-pro.description: Elevate your designs and unlock the full power of Elementor. Gain access to dozens of Pro widgets and kits, Theme Builder, Pop Ups, Forms and WooCommerce building capabilities.
elementor-pro.author: Elementor.com

embed-privacy.name: Embed Privacy
embed-privacy.description: Embed Privacy prevents from loading external embeds directly and lets the user control which one should be loaded.
embed-privacy.author: Epiphyt

envato-market.name: Envato Market
envato-market.description: WordPress Theme & Plugin management for the Envato Market.
envato-market.author: Envato

google-listings-and-ads.description: Native integration with Google that allows merchants to easily display their products across Googleâ€™s network.

loco-translate.name: Loco Translate
loco-translate.description: Translate themes and plugins directly in WordPress
loco-translate.author: Tim Whitlock

mailpoet.name: MailPoet
mailpoet.description: Create and send newsletters, post notifications and welcome emails from your WordPress.
mailpoet.author: MailPoet

metanow-remove-product-tabs.name: Metanow WooCommerce Remove Product Tabs
metanow-remove-product-tabs.description: Allows users to remove Description, Additional Information, and Reviews tabs from WooCommerce product pages.
metanow-remove-product-tabs.author: Metanow

pinterest-for-woocommerce.name: Pinterest for WooCommerce
pinterest-for-woocommerce.description: Grow your business on Pinterest! Use this official plugin to allow shoppers to Pin products while browsing your store, track conversions, and advertise on Pinterest.
pinterest-for-woocommerce.author: WooCommerce

real-cookie-banner.name: Real Cookie Banner (Free)
real-cookie-banner.description: Obtain GDPR (DSGVO) and ePrivacy (EU cookie law) compliant opt-in consent. Find cookies and fill all legal information in your cookie banner. More than just a cookie notice!
real-cookie-banner.author: devowl.io

sina-extension-for-elementor.name: Sina Extension for Elementor
sina-extension-for-elementor.description: A collection of high-quality widgets for Elementor page builder.
sina-extension-for-elementor.author: SinaExtra

statify.name: Statify
statify.description: Compact, easy-to-use and privacy-compliant stats plugin for WordPress.
statify.author: pluginkollektiv

woo-jtl-connector.name: JTL-Connector for WooCommerce
woo-jtl-connector.description: Connect your woocommerce-shop with JTL-Wawi, the free multichannel-erp for mail order business.
woo-jtl-connector.author: JTL-Software GmbH

woo-product-filter.name: Product Filter by WBW
woo-product-filter.description: Filter products in your store in most efficient way

woo-variation-swatches.description: Beautiful colors, images and buttons variation swatches for woocommerce product attributes. Requires WooCommerce 7.5+
woo-variation-swatches.author: Emran Ahmed

woocommerce.name: WooCommerce
woocommerce.description: An ecommerce toolkit that helps you sell anything. Beautifully.
woocommerce.author: Automattic

woocommerce-german-market-light.name: German Market Light
woocommerce-german-market-light.description: Extension for WooCommerce providing features for legal compliance when your e-commerce business is based in Germany or Austria.
woocommerce-german-market-light.author: MarketPress

woocommerce-payments.name: WooPayments
woocommerce-payments.description: Accept payments via credit card. Manage transactions within WordPress.
woocommerce-payments.author: WooCommerce

woocommerce-product-filters.name: Product Filters for WooCommerce
woocommerce-product-filters.description: This is a tool to create product filters that make the process of finding products in your store simple and fast.

woofilter-pro.name: WBW Product Filter PRO

wp-optimize.name: WP-Optimize - Clean, Compress, Cache
wp-optimize.description: WP-Optimize makes your site fast and efficient. It cleans the database, compresses images and caches pages. Fast sites attract more traffic and users.
wp-optimize.author: TeamUpdraft, DavidAnderson

yith-woocommerce-wishlist.name: YITH WooCommerce Wishlist
yith-woocommerce-wishlist.description: YITH WooCommerce Wishlist gives your users the possibility to create, fill, manage and share their wishlists allowing you to analyze their interests and needs to improve your marketing strategies. Get more plugins for your e-commerce on YITH
yith-woocommerce-wishlist.author: YITH
